  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Implement target specific parsing of immediate mnemonics.

The mnemonic is a string with a leading dot.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpumirformatter-h/#l00040">40</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpumirformatter-h">AMDGPUMIRFormatter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpumirformatter-cpp/#l00035">35</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpumirformatter-cpp">AMDGPUMIRFormatter.cpp</a>.

### printImm() {#aa7b088af8e8d9bff6f48072ca3f03114}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Implement target specific printing for machine operand immediate value, so that we can have more meaningful mnemonic than a 64-bit integer.

Passing None to OpIdx means the index is unknown.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpumirformatter-h/#l00034">34</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpumirformatter-h">AMDGPUMIRFormatter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpumirformatter-cpp/#l00019">19</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpumirformatter-cpp">AMDGPUMIRFormatter.cpp</a>.
